title: 'Feature and Drawbacks'
body: To be honest, I've been using these sanitary pads for a long and these are really suitable for women or girls who get excess bleeding. Due to its thickness it prevents leakage too. Although these are a bit costly but are highly reliable. Drawback:- One problem faced using this pads are that its wings are not sticky which sometimes make a person uncomfortable. The stickiness of the wings is reducing with passage of time.
